data.summary: Currently working for a telecommunications client in NZ as a Senior Frontend Developer/Consultant where I am building the next iteration of the online customer portal to allow them to buy mobile devices, plans and accessories. Using the full React ecosystem on the frontend - developing a NextJS app using Typescript which talks to a BFF (Backend for Frontend) which talks to various CMSs and third party systems for product catalogue and order management.

Reponsible for delivering an institutional banking analytics platform build using Google Cloud Platform, Kubernetes Engine and React for ANZ. Work with a team of Data Scientists to deliver critical analysis and insights through machine learning models and AI.
Responsible for maintenance of various customer facing websites and e-forms as well as design and develop product specific email marketing campaigns.
Responsible for delivering a functioning intranet function for the Corporate and the Operational teams within Latitude Financial Services (GE Capital).
As an Incident Manager, my job was to resolve high severity incidents on an on-call basis and weekend support according to the ITIL Incident Management Process.

Responsible for the delivery of the DR function for all critical IT applications for GE Capital. Daily tasks included conducting DR Tests, developing and reviewing System Recovery Plans, maintaining stakeholder management and recurring reporting to the business.

Responsible for successful implementation of all IT projects being implemented in GE Capital. I was responsible for all aspects of IT Service Management delivery for all the projects being implemented for GE Capital.

Responsible for provisioning and de-provisioning of profiles for GE employees for various internal applications for the business, managing AD, Exchange servers, inter-domain group policies, file folder access on GE servers, access to web applications via SSO, remote login and VPN.

Provide first level telephonic support for Dell Laptop customers from the United States. Recording the problems reported by the customer to the Company database. Provide troubleshooting to the customers in regards to software issues, hardware issues and dispatches.
